items.sentence: I thought Tom and Mary would be married by now.
I thought Tom was going to take us to see Mary.
I thought Tom would look more like his brother.
I thought Tom would love the gift you gave him.
Tom and I both don\'t understand French at all.
Tom and I don\'t play in the same band anymore.
Tom didn\'t have to help if he didn\'t want to.
Tom didn\'t have to stay if he didn\'t want to.
Tom didn\'t help Mary as much as he should\'ve.
Next year\'s conference will be held in Boston.
